_sText:
Another arena style map by me this one is equipt with the anti spawn killer 5000 tho ;) i spent a long time on the gameplay of this map, feedback welcome.
set sv_airaccelerate to around 100+ for best play.
jump when on ramps to gain speed and height and surf on sloped ramp sides.

people are complaining that they die when they get to the bottom of the ramp.  there is a reason why it is called SURF, you need to surf the sides.
